channel.title: Enviromental help
channel.description:
Ok well, when i went to enviromental variables, and set up the classpath and path. Nothing runs for me anymore like none of my run.bat. If i remove it still doesnt work.
When i did this it appears on and off fast and says cant recognize javac internal or external command.
Help please thanks.

item.title: Enviromental help
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

try replacing your run.bat with

@echo off title Combat Assault PKz java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
